title: Community Gardens
description: A recently widowed horticulturist, Joan Louen, decides to return to the peaceful, small town, where she married, in order to raise her son. Determined to start over and give her son a decent home, she restores a run-down antebellum house and the surrounding acreage, turning it into a thriving garden center. But when she attempts to install a community garden near the local library, she soon discovers that digging about the garden can reveal more than dirt.
author: Karin Boutall
